paper_abstract: A new algorithm for generation of substituted derivatives of a given structure and its software implementation are described. The program has deterministic and stochastic generation modes and efficiently supports various types of structural constraints. The problem of exhaustive and irredundant generation is discussed, and a new algorithm of the complete rejection of isomorphic molecular graphs is proposed. The main application of the generator is QSAR studies; however, applications in combinatorial chemistry are also possible.
paper_title: Generation of molecular graphs for QSAR studies: An approach based on supergraphs
